title: 'Sturdy
body: '5.0 out of 5 stars'I recently purchased a 3-seater wooden sofa for my parent's house and was initially skeptical about the assembly process. However, I was pleasantly surprised by the overall experience with this product. Firstly, the sofa arrived neatly packaged with no damage, which was a great relief. The seller also provided a 1-year warranty, and all the required screws & bolts were included, along with a spanner and Allen key that were neatly bundled in a pouch. The only con was the size of the ply for the seat was slightly larger, hence had to shave it off a bit (not an expensive or time-consuming job).  The assembly process was quite easy, and it took me only about 15 minutes to understand how to assemble the sofa. After that, it was a breeze to put it together. I was quite impressed with the seller's responsiveness on Amazon, especially when it seemed like the product might be delayed. However, the sofa did arrive on the promised date.  One thing to note is that the seller only offers replacement and not returns. However, given the quality of the product, I don't think one needs to worry about this. Overall, I am very happy with my purchase and feel that it is definitely worth the money spent. I highly recommend this sofa to anyone looking for a comfortable, stylish, and easy-to-assemble piece of furniture for their home.
